entries.title: The biggest esports scandals of the past 10 years
entries.description: Corporate catastrophes, cheating incidents, and heated gamer moments.

entries.title: An Enclave-themed group in Fallout 76 roleplayed the villains so hard it turned everyone against them
entries.description: Seemingly-benign roleplay gave way to enforcing its own rules on other players, with something more sinister potentially lurking beneath.

entries.title: Here's why a bunch of games, including Starfield, just changed release dates on Steam
entries.description: Starfield, Redfall, Ark 2, and a bunch of other games slated for launch in 2023 are now listed as simply “coming soon.”

entries.title: Nvidia and Google come out against Microsoft’s Activision Blizzard buyout
entries.description: The two tech giants recently shared their concerns about the deal with the FTC.

entries.title: Biggest leak in Valve's history includes pretty much everything from Portal, TF2, and Half-Life 2
entries.description: Sounds like a spy got in somewhere.

entries.title: This Animal Crossing creepypasta game is perfect for Friday the 13th
entries.description: What's better for a cursed day than a cursed game?

entries.title: Google serves up fake AMD driver downloads in search results
entries.description: Beware malware served up in Google ads. Again...

entries.title: Want to write for PC Gamer?
entries.description: We're looking for a new staff writer to join the team.

entries.title: Nvidia's latest AI lets you maintain uncanny valley levels of eye contact on camera
entries.description: Try not to creep out your co-workers too much with this gaze-augmenting AI tool, out now.

entries.title: Fortnite disables hurdling after it keeps launching players into the stratosphere
entries.description: Chapter 4 Season 1's launch has been full of hurdles of its own.

entries.title: Ubisoft CEO tells staff the ball is in their court to turn the company around
entries.description: Yves Guillemot also asked employees to tighten their belts when it comes to future spending.

entries.title: Assassin's Creed Mirage will be smaller because Ubisoft knows big games are getting tiresome
entries.description: Editing its world down might do Ubisoft some good.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 573 answer and hint for Friday, January 13
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #573 puzzle.

entries.title: So far, HBO's The Last of Us is a surprisingly simple adaptation
entries.description: An incredibly faithful retelling that feels like a relic of a different time.
